          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bicycle dynamo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrraddynamo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dynamo de bicyclette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dynamo da bicicleta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dinamo della bicicletta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυναμό ποδηλάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dínamo de la bicicleta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bicycle dynamo that uses mechanical energy from a bike tire as input to output electrical energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bike tire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Fahrraddynamo, der 
mechanische Energie von einem Fahrradgummireifen als Input verwendet, 
um elektrische Energie auszugeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une dynamo de 
bicyclette qui emploie l'énergie mécanique d'un pneu de vélo comme 
entrée pour sortir l'énergie électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um dynamo da bicicleta 
que use a energia mecânica de um pneu da bicicleta como a entrada 
output a energia elétrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una dinamo della 
bicicletta che usa l'energia meccanica da una gomma della bici come 
input per produrre l'energia elettrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δυναμό ποδηλάτων που 
χρησιμοποιεί τη μηχανική ενέργεια από μια ρόδα ποδηλάτων ως 
είσοδο στην ηλεκτρική ενέργεια εξόδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un dínamo de la 
bicicleta que utilice energía mecánica de un neumático de la bici 
como entrada de información para hacer salir energía eléctrica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrradgummireifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pneu de vélo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transfert d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pneu da bicicleta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transferência de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">roda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gomma della bici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasferimento di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρόδα ποδηλάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρόδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transferencia de energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
